Turtle Format: Task-Task01

Download Raw ttl 

@prefix fhir: <http://hl7.org/fhir/> .
@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .
@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .
@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .

# - resource -------------------------------------------------------------------

 a fhir:Task;
  fhir:nodeRole fhir:treeRoot;
  fhir:Resource.id [ fhir:value "Task01"];
  fhir:Resource.meta [
     fhir:Meta.profile [
       fhir:value "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/StructureDefinition/qicore-task";
       fhir:index 0     ]
  ];
  fhir:DomainResource.text [
     fhir:Narrative.status [ fhir:value "generated" ];
     fhir:Narrative.div "<div xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"><p><b>Generated Narrative with Details</b></p><p><b>id</b>: Task01</p><p><b>meta</b>: </p><p><b>identifier</b>: 19009</p><p><b>status</b>: completed</p><p><b>intent</b>: plan</p><p><b>priority</b>: routine</p><p><b>code</b>: Medication Reconciliation <span style=\"background: LightGoldenRodYellow\">(Details : {http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt code '1111F' = '1111F', given as 'Medication Reconciliation'})</span></p><p><b>for</b>: <a href=\"Patient-patient01.html\">Generated Summary: id: patient01; Medical record number = 12345 (USUAL); active; Jairo Webster (OFFICIAL); gender: male; birthDate: 1946-12-16; <span title=\"Codes: {http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/MaritalStatus M}\">Married</span></a></p><p><b>context</b>: <a href=\"Encounter-Encounter01.html\">Generated Summary: id: Encounter01; status: finished; <span title=\"{http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode IMP}\">inpatient encounter</span>; <span title=\"Codes: {http://snomed.info/sct 56876005}\">Drug rehabilitation and detoxification</span>; period: May 29, 2018, 8:00:00 AM --&gt; May 29, 2018, 8:00:00 AM</a></p><p><b>executionPeriod</b>: Jun 11, 2017, 12:00:00 AM --&gt; Jun 11, 2017, 12:00:00 AM</p><p><b>authoredOn</b>: Sep 25, 2018, 7:24:23 AM</p><p><b>owner</b>: <a href=\"Practitioner-practitioner01.html\">Generated Summary: id: practitioner01; Provider number = 456789123 (OFFICIAL); active; Cody Hale ; gender: male</a></p></div>"
  ];
  fhir:Task.identifier [
     fhir:index 0;
     fhir:Identifier.system [ fhir:value "http://www.acme.org/tasks" ];
     fhir:Identifier.value [ fhir:value "19009" ]
  ];
  fhir:Task.status [ fhir:value "completed"];
  fhir:Task.intent [ fhir:value "plan"];
  fhir:Task.priority [ fhir:value "routine"];
  fhir:Task.code [
     fhir:CodeableConcept.coding [
       fhir:index 0;
       fhir:Coding.system [ fhir:value "http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt" ];
       fhir:Coding.code [ fhir:value "1111F" ];
       fhir:Coding.display [ fhir:value "Medication Reconciliation" ]     ]
  ];
  fhir:Task.for [
     fhir:Reference.reference [ fhir:value "Patient/patient01" ]
  ];
  fhir:Task.context [
     fhir:Reference.reference [ fhir:value "Encounter/Encounter01" ]
  ];
  fhir:Task.executionPeriod [
     fhir:Period.start [ fhir:value "2017-06-11"^^xsd:date ];
     fhir:Period.end [ fhir:value "2017-06-11"^^xsd:date ]
  ];
  fhir:Task.authoredOn [ fhir:value "2018-09-25T14:24:23.584Z"^^xsd:dateTime];
  fhir:Task.owner [
     fhir:Reference.reference [ fhir:value "Practitioner/practitioner01" ]
  ].

# - ontology header ------------------------------------------------------------

 a owl:Ontology;
  owl:imports fhir:fhir.ttl.
